trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event lets you customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>事件可讓您自訂 （或主控描繪） 的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>詳細資料檢視中的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>就會引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為`true`和其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the header.
trans-unit.target: 包含資訊傳遞至事件處理常式 DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>繪製也會提供方法來協助您繪製標頭。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve information about the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A>屬性，以擷取資料行標頭，若要繪製的相關資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A>屬性來進行實際所指定的區域內繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繪製標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>元素不需要自訂，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>屬性，當您想要繪製子項目的的作業系統。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific headers.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要自訂特定的標頭時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 避免問題當主控描繪，覆寫時，圖形閃爍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制以及設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能時，只能在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列產品上使用您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>介面在其上繪製。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>在其中繪製。

trans-unit.source: The index of the header's column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 標頭的資料行內的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the header to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>表示要繪製的標頭。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref>數值，指出資料行標頭的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the header.
trans-unit.target: 前景<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>標頭。

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the header.
trans-unit.target: 背景<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>標頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used for the header text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>用於標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得標頭的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the background color of the header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>代表標頭的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: 取得大小與要繪製之資料行標題的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所指定的位置是相對於左上角<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示資料行行首的界限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the header to draw.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>表示要繪製的標頭。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料行標頭中的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the column header.
trans-unit.target: 繪製資料行行首的背景。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the standard background for the column header.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來繪製資料行行首的標準背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column header should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應繪製資料行標頭，而不是主控描繪的作業系統。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event for headers that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，處理時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>事件，您不想要自訂的標頭。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the header will be drawn as usual.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，標頭會如往常般繪製。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果標頭應該繪製作業系統;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Draws the column header text using the default formatting.
trans-unit.target: 繪製使用預設的格式化資料行標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not need to customize the appearance of the header text.
trans-unit.target: 當您不需要自訂標頭文字的外觀時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the column header text, formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 繪製資料行標頭文字，其具有指定格式化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not need to customize the appearance of the header text.
trans-unit.target: 當您不需要自訂標頭文字的外觀時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the header, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>中指定的值`flags`參數可讓您提供格式內容標頭，例如文字對齊方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to draw the column header text.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來繪製資料行標頭文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> representing the font of the header text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>代表標頭文字字型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得標頭的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the foreground color of the header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>代表標頭的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the column header.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>用來繪製資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別提供屬性和顯示裝置上繪製的有用的方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用來繪製資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>表示要繪製的資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性相當實用時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>屬性不提供足夠的資訊，以符合您需求。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the mouse is over the column header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>屬性只會提供基本的狀態資訊，您可以使用，例如，若要判斷滑鼠是否在資料行標頭。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Header property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header.
trans-unit.target: 標頭屬性，相反地，可讓您存取的所有成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>代表標頭。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the column header.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>表示資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料行行首的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the mouse pointer is over the header or whether the user has clicked the header.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷是否將滑鼠指標在行首或使用者是否按一下標頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> values for these states are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>這些狀態的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref>數值，指出資料行標頭的目前狀態。
